jobTitle: Product Manager, Internal Spend Management Tools
description:
The Cydio Group ( www.cydio.com ) is a premier IT staffing company Founded by IT professionals, The Cydio Group differentiates itself by bringing firsthand IT knowledge and experience to the IT staffing industry.

A client of ours has an immediate opening for a Product Manager, Internal Spend Management Tools . If you or someone you know may be interested, please respond today.



Job Description:



The Product, Design, & Marketing Budget Team is seeking a resourceful and experienced product manager to oversee development of an internal tool. This position is responsible for documenting new feature requests, bugs, and enhancements, overseeing feature development, gathering requirements and creating documentation.



The ideal candidate is a creative problem solver that can recognize issues and identify solutions. The candidate is a self-starter who takes initiative and thrives in a fast-paced environment; able to work autonomously; detailed; and able to communicate effectively with developers and internal customers. Experience with large data sets and spend data such as Purchase Requests, Purchase Orders, and invoices is a plus.



Responsibilities:



- Create, enhance, and manage internal tool by identifying user needs and creating high-level feature requirements



- Manage end-to-end implementation, QA, and user-acceptance testing of tool with development team and users



- Identify user-facing and back-end bugs and work with team and developers to prioritize accordingly



- Liaison between users and developers to prioritize fixes and gather essential required info on reported issues



- Document user processes and backend workflows



- Perform data analysis, reconcile data, and audit data to verify data in tool is accurate and complete - Manage our ticketing system that tracks bugs and feature requests; determine appropriate action for each ticket with minimal supervision



- Schedule meetings and take detailed meetings notes and follow up on action items with the internal team and developers



- Complete root cause analysis to identify underlying issues and develop solutions accordingly





Skills/Experience: 



Required Qualifications:



- 3+ years of experience with software development, product management, project management



Preferred Qualifications:



- Familiarity with drafting high-level feature requirements



- Aptitude for evaluating/troubleshooting technical issues and chasing solutions and fixes



- Proficient in communicating between both technical and non-technical team members



- Proficient in Microsoft Excel and SQL



- Knowledge of Purchase to Pay processes



- Strong understanding of financial data including but not limited to Purchase Requests, Purchase Orders, and invoices



- Proven record of quickly ramping to understand a complex organization’s end-user types, individual groups' requirements and how potential new features or changes impact a platform holistically



- Comfortable with ambiguity and adjusting to evolving business requirements and priorities





Pay Range: $55.73/hr. - $69.67/hr.





US citizens and those authorized to work in the US are encouraged to apply. WE ARE UNABLE TO SPONSOR H1B CANDIDATES AT THIS TIME.
